name: @adobe/coriolis
description: A library for cross iframe communication with high level API and features.

scripts.test-old2: NODE_ENV=test parcel test/fixture/coriolis.html && NODE_ENV=test karma start
scripts.test-old: NODE_ENV=test webpack --mode development && NODE_ENV=test karma start
scripts.doc: npx typedoc src/*.ts src/**/*.ts --out reporting/doc --sort visibility --readme none
scripts.graph: npm run graph:archi && npm run graph:dependency
scripts.graph:archi: mkdir -p reporting/archi &&  depcruise --config .dependency-cruiser.js --output-type archi src/Coriolis.ts | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > reporting/archi/archi-graph.html
scripts.graph:dependency: mkdir -p reporting/archi &&  depcruise --config .dependency-cruiser.js --output-type dot src/index.ts | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > reporting/archi/dependency-graph.html
scripts.deploy-doc: npm run doc && npx gh-pages -d reporting/doc
